# <a name="how-to-remove-autogenerated-columns-from-a-windows-forms-datagridview-control"></a><span data-ttu-id="701ff-102">Como remover colunas geradas automaticamente de um controle DataGridView dos Windows Forms</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="701ff-102">How to: Remove Autogenerated Columns from a Windows Forms DataGridView Control</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="701ff-103">Quando seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controle está definido para gerar automaticamente suas colunas com base nos dados da fonte de dados, você pode omitir seletivamente determinadas colunas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="701ff-103">When your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is set to autogenerate its columns based on data from its data source, you can selectively omit certain columns.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="701ff-104">Você pode fazer isso chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> método o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> coleção.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="701ff-104">You can do this by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="701ff-105">Como alternativa, você pode ocultar colunas da exibição, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> propriedade `false`.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="701ff-105">Alternatively, you can hide columns from view by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property to `false`.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="701ff-106">Essa técnica é útil quando você deseja exibir as colunas ocultas em determinadas condições ou quando você precisa acessar os dados nas colunas sem exibi-lo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="701ff-106">This technique is useful when you want to display the hidden columns in certain conditions, or when you need to access the data in the columns without displaying it.</span></span>  
  
### <a name="to-remove-autogenerated-columns"></a><span data-ttu-id="701ff-107">Para remover colunas geradas automaticamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="701ff-107">To remove autogenerated columns</span></span>  
  
-   <span data-ttu-id="701ff-108">Chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> método sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> coleção.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="701ff-108">Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.</span></span>  
  
     [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#111](../../../../samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#111)]
     [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#111](../../../../samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#111)]  
  
### <a name="to-hide-autogenerated-columns"></a><span data-ttu-id="701ff-109">Para ocultar colunas geradas automaticamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="701ff-109">To hide autogenerated columns</span></span>  
  
-   <span data-ttu-id="701ff-110">Definir a coluna <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> propriedade `false`.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="701ff-110">Set the column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property to `false`.</span></span>  
  
     [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#112](../../../../samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#112)]
     [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#112](../../../../samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#112)]

## <a name="compiling-the-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="701ff-112">Compilando o código</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="701ff-112">Compiling the Code</span></span>  
 <span data-ttu-id="701ff-113">Este exemplo requer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="701ff-113">This example requires:</span></span>  
  
-   <span data-ttu-id="701ff-114">Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controle chamado `dataGridView1` associada a uma tabela que contém `Fax` e `CustomerID` colunas, como o `Customers` tabela no banco de dados de exemplo Northwind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="701ff-114">A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control named `dataGridView1` bound to a table that contains `Fax` and `CustomerID` columns, such as the `Customers` table in the Northwind sample database.</span></span>  
  
-   <span data-ttu-id="701ff-115">Referências aos assemblies <xref:System?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType>.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="701ff-115">References to the <xref:System?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType> assemblies.</span></span>
